entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kawartha Lakes (Lindsay)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:01 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -3.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 06:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -3.6°C
Pressure: 101.0 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -4.4°C
Wind: SSW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the morning. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
